commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku local [PROCESSNAME] [34m[flags][39m

[1mrun heroku app locally[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -e, --env ENV            [2mlocation of env file (defaults to .env)[22m
 -f, --procfile PROCFILE  [2muse a different Procfile[22m
 -p, --port PORT          [2mport to listen on[22m

Start the application specified by a Procfile (defaults to ./Procfile)

Examples:

    heroku local
    heroku local web
    heroku local web=2
    heroku local web=1,worker=2

[1mUsage:[22m heroku local:start [PROCESSNAME] [34m[flags][39m

[1mrun heroku app locally[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -e, --env ENV            [2mlocation of env file (defaults to .env)[22m
 -f, --procfile PROCFILE  [2muse a different Procfile[22m
 -p, --port PORT          [2mport to listen on[22m

Start the application specified by a Procfile (defaults to ./Procfile)

Examples:

    heroku local
    heroku local web
    heroku local web=2
    heroku local web=1,worker=2

[1mUsage:[22m heroku local:run [34m[flags][39m

[1mrun a one-off command[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -e, --env ENV
 -p, --port PORT

Example:

    heroku local:run bin/migrate

[1mUsage:[22m heroku local:version

[1mdisplay node-foreman version[22m

Display node-foreman version
